DOC.brief_summary: A dose finding study to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of FK778 in kidney transplant patients
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate FK778 in Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient has end stage kidney disease or needs retransplantation (loss of graft for nonimmunological reasons). Patient has been fully informed. Patient has an immunological high risk and/or having a previous graft survival shorter than 1 year due to immunological reasons. Patient has significant liver disease. Cold ischemia time of the donor kidney >28 hours. Patient having uncontrolled concomitant infections and/or severe diarrhoea, vomiting, active upper gastrointestinal tract malabsorption or active peptic ulcer. Patient has previously received or is receiving an organ transplant other than kidney.
